PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CableSegmentTypeConductorSegment
PropertySetDef.Definition: An electrical conductor is a single linear element with the specific purpose to lead electric current. The core of one lead is normally single wired or multiwired which are intertwined. According to IEC 60050: IEV 195-01-07, a conductor is a conductive part intended to carry a specified electric current.

PropertyDef.Name: Construction
PropertyDef.Definition: Purpose of informing on how the vonductor is constucted (interwined or solid). I.e. Solid (IEV 461-01-06), stranded (IEV 461-01-07), solid-/finestranded(IEV 461-01-11) (not flexible/flexible).

PropertyDef.Name: CrossSectionalArea
PropertyDef.Definition: Cross section area of the phase(s) lead(s).

PropertyDef.Name: Function
PropertyDef.Definition: Type of function for which the conductor is intended.

PropertyDef.Name: Material
PropertyDef.Definition: Type of material from which the conductor is constructed.

PropertyDef.Name: Shape
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of the shape of the conductor.
